INSERT INTO rpt_user_secret_info_day (id,user_no,user_name,device_ip,depart_no,depart_name,secret_file_name,business,`count`,data_time,`time`) VALUES
(#{item.id}, #{item.userNo}, #{item.userName}, #{item.deviceIp}, #{item.departNo}, #{item.departName}, #{item.secretFileName}, #{item.business}, #{item.count}, DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(NOW(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d'), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT user_no userNo, user_name useName, device_ip deviceIp, depart_no departNo, depart_name departName, secret_file_name secretFileName, business, sum( count ) count, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H') version, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP time FROM ( SELECT user_no, user_name, device_ip, depart_no, depart_name, secret_file_name, business, count FROM rpt_user_secret_info_day WHERE data_time = DATE_FORMAT( date_sub( NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) UNION ALL SELECT user_no, user_name, device_ip, depart_no, depart_name, secret_file_name, business, count FROM rpt_user_secret_info_total ) a GROUP BY device_ip, secret_file_name

SELECT depart_no departNo, depart_name departName, GROUP_CONCAT( business ) business, SUM( count ) num, COUNT( secret_file_name ) count FROM rpt_user_secret_info_day WHERE data_time = DATE_FORMAT( date_sub( NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) GROUP BY depart_no
